name: create-menu-selection
description: Guide for creating a new selectable list menu with consistent styling and behavior
prompt: Use this skill when you need to create a new selectable list menu in Panoptes. It includes complete examples, common patterns, and a testing checklist to ensure your menu matches the existing UI patterns.
